## ReferenceTypeSchema interface

有namespace的情况

import { MyNS } from './myns'; type MyType2 = MyNS.MyType;

MyType2 ↓ importPath: './myns' targetName: 'MyNS.MyType'

查找引用时，如果targetName没有小数点，直接查Type；如果有小数点，则以小数点隔开查namespace，知道最后一位查Type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReferenceTypeSchema 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [target](./tsbuffer-schema.referencetypeschema.target.md) | string | 引用目标的SchemaID |
|  [type](./tsbuffer-schema.referencetypeschema.type.md) | 'Reference' |  |
